notification: Due to the lack of precise information on the location of individual cases in the latest announcements of the Ministry of Health, we are forced to limit ourselves to displaying data by voivodship.
relevanceInfo: The author is not responsible for the relevance and correctness of the content provided. The data may be out of date.
author: Author: Konrad Kalemba
openSourceApp: The application is 'open-source' - anyone willing can directly help in the development of the project. Source code can be found at the following link:
curedInfo: The daily number of healed was corrected after misinterpreting the GIS message, which spoke of 13 healers.
